header.title: Datasets
header.subtitle: Only CSV files are currently supported.
header.description: Use a dataset as the basis for your evaluation. It includes data for the model you'd like to evaluate and possibly a ground truth answer.

emptyDataset.title: Submit a dataset to start using Lumigator.
emptyDataset.note: Your dataset should be a CSV file and include the following columns:
emptyDataset.columnOptional: column is optional, as it can be generated using Lumigator.

header.title: Experiments
header.description: Experiments are a logical sequence of inference and evaluation tasks that run sequentially to evaluate an LLM.

emptyExperiments.note: We evaluate Summarization tasks using ROUGE, METEOR, and BERT score, each focusing on different aspects of prediction-ground truth similarity.

form.text: Summarization jobs are evaluated with ROUGE, METEOR, and BERT score, each focusing on different aspects of prediction-ground truth similarity.
